## üíª Technical Specifications

### Design System
- **Base:** Axtra Design System (use designtoken.md and designsystem.md from project)
- **Design Tokens:** CSS custom properties for all styling
- **Typography:** System font stack from Axtra
- **Spacing:** Use Axtra spacing scale
- **Responsive:** Mobile-first approach

### HTML Structure
```
- Semantic HTML5 elements
- Clean, accessible markup (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Proper heading hierarchy (h1 ‚Üí h2 ‚Üí h3)
- Descriptive alt text for images
- ARIA labels where needed
```

### CSS Approach
```
- Use Axtra design tokens (CSS custom properties)
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Breakpoints: 640px (sm), 768px (md), 1024px (lg), 1280px (xl)
- CSS Grid and Flexbox for layouts
- Smooth transitions and hover states
- No external CSS libraries
```

### Step 7: Style with Axtra Design System
- Apply design tokens for colors
- Use {designStyle} style principles
- Implement spacing scale consistently
- Add hover states and transitions
- Ensure accessibility (focus states, contrast ratios)

### Step 8: Responsive Design
- Test at all breakpoints: mobile (375px), tablet (768px), desktop (1280px)
- Ensure typography scales appropriately
- Stack elements vertically on mobile
- Adjust spacing for different screen sizes

### Step 9: Polish & Optimization
- Add smooth scroll behavior
- Implement micro-interactions
- Optimize for performance (minimize CSS, use efficient selectors)
- Add loading states if needed
- Test accessibility with keyboard navigation

## üé® Design Specifications

### Typography Scale
- **Main Headline:** var(--text-5xl) or var(--text-4xl), font-weight: var(--font-bold)
- **Sub-Headline:** var(--text-xl) or var(--text-lg), font-weight: var(--font-normal)
- **Section Headers:** var(--text-3xl) or var(--text-2xl), font-weight: var(--font-semibold)
- **Body Text:** var(--text-base), font-weight: var(--font-normal), color: var(--color-text-secondary)
- **Small Text:** var(--text-sm), color: var(--color-text-tertiary)

### Spacing Guidelines
- **Section Padding:** var(--spacing-24) on desktop, var(--spacing-16) on mobile
- **Component Gaps:** var(--spacing-16) between major components
- **Content Width:** max-width: 1280px with auto margins for centering

### Button Styles
- **Primary CTA:** 
  - Background: var(--color-primary) or var(--color-accent)
  - Padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-8)
  - Border-radius: var(--radius-lg)
  - Font-size: var(--text-lg)
  - Font-weight: var(--font-semibold)
  - Hover: transform: translateY(-2px), box-shadow

### Card Components
- Background: var(--color-surface)
- Border: 1px solid var(--color-border)
- Border-radius: var(--radius-xl)
- Padding: var(--spacing-8)
- Box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm)

## ‚úÖ Quality Checklist

Before considering the landing page complete, ensure:

- [ ] All content from this brief is included
- [ ] Responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- [ ] All CTAs are clearly visible and clickable
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for text)
- [ ] All interactive elements have hover/focus states
- [ ] Form validation works properly (if applicable)
- [ ] Page loads quickly (< 3 seconds)
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Semantic HTML structure
- [ ] Alt text on all images
- [ ] Proper heading hierarchy
- [ ] Consistent spacing throughout
